meanings: (있던 곳에서 다른 곳으로) leave, (formal) depart, go off (to)
(출발하다) leave, start off, set off, (formal) depart, (차량이) pull out

vlive.korean: 머리는 한국 떠날 때. My hair, when we left Korea. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 샌프란시스코 나잇🐹
vlive.english: My hair, when we left Korea.

vlive.korean: 떠날 때 같이 떠나야지. We need to leave together when we leave. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 오사카 밤밤밤에~💫
vlive.english: We need to leave together when we leave.

vlive.korean: 일단 이걸 우리가 여기에서 떠날 때 공개를 할 거야. We'll reveal these when we leave here. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : Ep.07 '인간 김재중'의 이야기
vlive.english: We'll reveal these when we leave here.

vlive.korean: 맞아. 네가 떠날 때... Right. If you don't leave... 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : DJ미미의 밈나잇😎크끅
우리가 떠날 때까지만 해도 날씨 안 좋았는데. The weather wasn't good when we left. 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 젠득이랑슈는지금일본입니다:)
vlive.english: The weather wasn't good when we left.

examples.korean: I was with him at the end. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그가 최후를 맞을[세상을 떠날] 때 함께 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was with him at the end. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Dawn was breaking when they finally left. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들이 마침내 떠날 때는 동이 트고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Dawn was breaking when they finally left. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The train whistle blew as we left the station. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 역을 떠날 때 기차가 기적을 울렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The train whistle blew as we left the station. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We decided it was time to quit the city. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그 도시를 떠날 때가 되었다는 결정을 내렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We decided it was time to quit the city. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: When I left they were all still hard at it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 떠날 때 그들은 모두 아직 열심히 일을 하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: When I left they were all still hard at it. Add to Wordbook
